channel.title: My stuff for trade
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "My stuff for trade"

item.title: Re: My stuff for trade
item.content:encoded: I was thinking of that Yoshirou, but I thought any item in bucket could be traded by Trade Menu, thanks anyways guys ^^

item.title: Re: My stuff for trade
item.content:encoded:
Smokeblossom: 37
Shogi Piece: 1
Shuriken: 49
Silver Petals: 6
Sham Rock: 2
Nightshade: 1
Monochrome Flower: 1
Mystery Meat: 3
Kunai: 87
Holy Arrow: 2
Invisible Sandwich: 5
Exploding Tags: 12
Crystal Lens: 3
Boring Bulb: 9
Bitter Powder: 1
Ash-Covered Tile: 22
Ashen Film: 2

Thats what he has that is Tradeable, but can I say you should turn the Smokeblossom: 37 into Smoke Bomb: 111

then you might have something worth trading

item.title: Re: My stuff for trade
item.content:encoded: Many things in this list are not tradeable like tiles, rubber bits, sharpening stone, gears, note pages, razor blades, rivets, greassy items, reflector shard, emo cd's, glassed sand, diet soda, acid vile, shafts, and maybe apple-y-goodness arent tradeable either. Go to storehouse and then copy and paste that list of items that are depositable and then your list is correct.

item.title: My stuff for trade
